lead_paragraph: P.P.O.W. and Galerie Lelong will collaborate on that show. Also, the artist Marcel Dzama is designing sets and costumes for Justin Peck’s new ballet.

headline.main: Galleries to Mount Joint Carolee Schneemann Exhibition

snippet: P.P.O.W. and Galerie Lelong will collaborate on that show. Also, the artist Marcel Dzama is designing sets and costumes for Justin Peck’s new ballet.
abstract: Robin Pogrebin Inside Art column; P P O W gallery and Galerie Lelong will co-host October solo exhibition of works by feminist artist Carolee Schneemann; visual artist Marcel Dzama, selected by New York City Ballet to create installation at David H Koch Theater promenade, will design costumes and sets for Justin Peck’s ballet The Most Incredible Thing; Augusto Arbizo celebrates new home of his 11R gallery at 195 Chrystie Street with January display of watercolors and collages by artist Moira Dryer.
